languages.text: "Этот цикл смерти и перерождения, и счастье от осознания того, что мы лишь куски гниющего мяса — вот моя награда и избавленье". {n}Понизив голос до вкрадчивого шепота, Иеронимус улыбается вам чернеющими зубами.{/n} "Такова мудрость Дедушки Нургла, моего нового пастыря. Твои слова, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, отправили мой разум в паломничество в поисках ответов. Тогда-то мне и явилось видение — прекрасный ангел из прелой плоти, покрытой благостными гнойниками и нарывами. Он и открыл мне Истину. Он избавил меня от бессмысленного страха смерти. А я теперь избавлю от него других. Разве не прекрасно?"

"This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"
languages.original_text: "Этот цикл смерти и перерождения, и счастье от осознания того, что мы лишь куски гниющего мяса — вот моя награда и избавленье". {n}Понизив голос до вкрадчивого шепота, Иеронимус улыбается вам чернеющими зубами.{/n} "Такова мудрость Дедушки Нургла, моего нового пастыря. Твои слова, {mf|сыне|дщерь}, отправили мой разум в паломничество в поисках ответов. Тогда-то мне и явилось видение — прекрасный ангел из прелой плоти, покрытой благостными гнойниками и нарывами. Он и открыл мне Истину. Он избавил меня от бессмысленного страха смерти. А я теперь избавлю от него других. Разве не прекрасно?"

Your words, {mf|son|daughter}, sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

languages.text: 「この死と再生の輪廻、自身が一塊の腐れる肉片にすぎんと理解する幸福こそが、私への報酬であり救済なのだ」{n}ヒエロニムスはご機嫌を取るようなささやき声で、黒ずんだ歯を見せて笑いかける。{/n}「師父ナーグルの智恵は偉大だ、子羊よ。君の言葉が、我が心を答えを探す旅へと誘った。あの時からなのだ、腫瘍と膿疱に覆われた美しい腐肉の天使のビジョンが見えるようになったのは。彼は私に真実を示した。私を無意味な死の恐怖から救ってくれたのだ。そして今度は私が他者を救済する番だ。素晴らしいとは思わんかね？」
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: 「この死と再生の輪廻、自身が一塊の腐れる肉片にすぎんと理解する幸福こそが、私への報酬であり救済なのだ」{n}ヒエロニムスはご機嫌を取るようなささやき声で、黒ずんだ歯を見せて笑いかける。{/n}「師父ナーグルの智恵は偉大だ、子羊よ。君の言葉が、我が心を答えを探す旅へと誘った。あの時からなのだ、腫瘍と膿疱に覆われた美しい腐肉の天使のビジョンが見えるようになったのは。彼は私に真実を示した。私を無意味な死の恐怖から救ってくれたのだ。そして今度は私が他者を救済する番だ。素晴らしいとは思わんかね？」

languages.text: « J'ai déjà ma récompense et ma délivrance, entre ce cycle de mort et de renaissance, et le bonheur de comprendre que nous ne sommes que des morceaux de chair en décomposition. » {n}Vous souriant de ses dents noircies, Hiéronymus murmure mielleusement :{/n} « Telle est la sagesse de Père Nurgle, mon nouveau berger. Vos paroles ont poussé mon esprit à chercher des réponses et j'ai eu la vision d'un ange magnifique, à la chair décomposée recouverte de furoncles et de pustules. Il m'a dévoilé la vérité. Il m'a délivré de cette crainte inutile de la mort. Et maintenant, c'est à mon tour d'en libérer les autres. N'est-ce pas merveilleux ? »
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà ma récompense et ma délivrance, entre ce cycle de mort et de renaissance, et le bonheur de comprendre que nous ne sommes que des morceaux de viande en décomposition. » {n}Vous souriant de ses dents noircies, Hiéronymus murmure mielleusement :{/n} « Telle est la sagesse de grand-père Nurgle, mon nouveau berger. Vos paroles, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}, ont poussé mon esprit à chercher des réponses et j'ai eu la vision d'un ange magnifique, à la chair décomposée recouverte de furoncles et de pustules. Il m'a dévoilé la vérité. Il m'a délivré de cette crainte inutile de la mort. Et maintenant, c'est à mon tour d'en libérer les autres. N'est-ce pas merveilleux ? »

languages.text: “我意识到了真理。我意识到，我们不过是一块块腐肉罢了。这样的真理，以及这死亡与重生的轮回，便是对我的奖赏与救赎。”{n}希罗尼穆斯压低了声音，仿佛谄媚的耳语。他露出发黑的牙齿，对你微笑起来。{/n}“这就是我新的牧人，纳垢慈父赐予我的智慧。你的话语让我不断寻求答案，而就在那个时候，我看到了一位浑身长满疖子与脓疮的美丽天使。他向我揭示了真相，将我从对死亡的愚蠢恐惧中解救出来。如今，我会将其他人从死亡中解救出来，这实在是妙不可言，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: “我意识到了真理。我意识到，我们不过是一块块腐肉罢了。这样的真理，以及这死亡与重生的轮回，就是对我的奖赏与救赎。”{n}希罗尼穆斯压低了声音，仿佛谄媚的耳语。他露出发黑的牙齿，对你微笑起来。{/n}“这就是我新的牧人，纳垢慈父赐予我的智慧，{mf|孩子|女儿}。你的话语让我不断寻求答案，而就在那个时候，我看到了一位浑身长满疖子与脓疮的美丽天使。他向我揭示了真相，将我从对死亡的愚蠢恐惧中解救出来。如今，我会将其他人从死亡中解救出来，这实在是妙不可言，不是吗？”

languages.text: "Dieser Zyklus aus Tod und Wiedergeburt sowie die schöne Erkenntnis, dass wir nur verrottende Fleischstücke sind, sind meine Belohnung und meine Erlösung." {n}Hieronymus senkt die Stimme zu einem einschmeichelnden flüstern und lächelt dich mit schwarzen Zähnen an.{/n} "Das ist die Weisheit von Großvater Nurgle, meinem neuen Hirten. Eure Worte haben meinen Geist auf die Suche nach Antworten geschickt. Dabei hatte ich die Vision eines wunderschönen Engels aus verfaulendem Fleisch, bedeckt mit Furunkeln und Pusteln. Er offenbarte mir die Wahrheit. Er rettete mich vor der sinnlosen Angst vor dem Tod. Und jetzt werde ich andere davon befreien. Ist das nicht wunderbar?"
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Zyklus von Tod und Wiedergeburt sowie die schöne Erkenntnis, dass wir nur verrottende Fleischstücke sind, sind meine Belohnung und meine Erlösung." {n}Hieronymus senkt die Stimme zu einem einschmeichelnden flüstern und lächelt dich mit schwarzen Zähnen an.{/n} "Das ist die Weisheit von Großvater Nurgle, meinem neuen Hirten. Eure Worte, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}, haben meinen Geist auf die Suche nach Antworten geschickt. Dabei hatte ich die Vision eines wunderschönen Engels aus verfaulendem Fleisch, bedeckt mit Furunkeln und Pusteln. Er offenbarte mir die Wahrheit. Er rettete mich vor der sinnlosen Angst vor dem Tod. Und jetzt werde ich andere davon befreien. Ist das nicht wunderbar?"

languages.text: «El ciclo de la vida y la muerte, y la felicidad de darse cuenta de que no somos más que trozos de carne en descomposición es mi recompensa y mi salvación». {n}Hieronymus baja la voz hasta producir nada más que un agradable murmullo y te sonríe con sus ennegrecidos dientes.{/n} «Dicha es la reflexión del abuelo Nurgle, mi nuevo pastor. Sus palabras me han hecho formularme algunas preguntas. Fue entonces cuando tuve la visión de un precioso ángel con la piel podrida y cubierta de forúnculos y pústulas. Gracias a eso me di cuenta de la verdad, me liberé del irracional miedo a la muerte. Y ahora eximiré a otros de esa carga. ¿No le parece maravilloso?».
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: «El ciclo de la vida y la muerte, y la felicidad de darse cuenta de que no somos más que trozos de carne en descomposición es mi recompensa y mi salvación». {n}Hieronymus baja la voz hasta producir nada más que un agradable murmullo y te sonríe con sus ennegrecidos dientes.{/n} «Dicha es la reflexión del abuelo Nurgle, mi nuevo pastor. Sus palabras, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}, me han hecho formularme algunas preguntas. Fue entonces cuando tuve la visión de un precioso ángel con la piel podrida y cubierta de forúnculos y pústulas. Gracias a eso me di cuenta de la verdad, me liberé del irracional miedo a la muerte. Y ahora eximiré a otros de esa carga. ¿No le parece maravilloso?».

languages.text: "Bu ölüm ve yeniden doğum döngüsü ile hepimizin çürüyen birer et parçası olduğumuzun farkındalığı. Ödülüm ve kurtuluşum budur." {n}Hieronymus, sokulgan bir tavırla sesini alçaltıp kararmış dişleriyle sana gülümsüyor.{/n} "Büyükbaba Nurgle'ın, yeni çobanımın irfanı böyle bir şeydir. Sözlerin zihnimi yanıt arayışına sevk etti. Bu arayış sırasında da çürüyen bedeni çıbanlarla ve sivilcelerle kaplı güzeller güzeli bir meleğin görüsüne nail oldum. Beni anlamsız ölüm korkusundan azat etti. Ben de şimdi başkalarını azat edeceğim. Muhteşem, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "This cycle of death and rebirth, and the happiness of realising that we are but pieces of rotting meat, this is my reward and deliverance." {n}Hieronymus lowers his voice to an ingratiating whisper and smiles at you with blackening teeth.{/n} "Such is the wisdom of Grandfather Nurgle, my new shepherd. Your words sent my mind questing in search of answers. It was then that I had a vision of a beautiful angel of rotting flesh covered with boils and pustules. He revealed the truth to me. He delivered me from the meaningless fear of death. And now I will free others from it. Is it not wonderful?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu ölüm ve yeniden doğum döngüsü ve de hepimizin çürüyen et parçalarından başka bir şey olmadığımızın farkına varmak. Ödülüm ve kurtuluşum bu." {n}Hieronymus sokulgan bir tavırla sesini alçaltıyor ve sana kararmış dişleriyle gülümsüyor.{/n} "Büyükbaba Nurgle'ın, benim yeni çobanımın irfanı böyle bir şeydir. Sözlerin zihnimi yanıt arayışına sevk etti. Bu arayış sırasında da çürüyen bedeni çıbanlarla ve sivilcelerle kaplı güzeller güzeli bir meleğe dair bir görüye şahit oldum. Beni anlamsız ölüm korkusundan azat etti. Şimdi de ben diğerlerini azat edeceğim. Muhteşem, değil mi?"
